

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

data1 <- read_csv(file = "data/player_Full_stats_23.csv")
data2 <- read_csv(file = "data/player_valuations.csv")
players <- read_csv(file = "data/players.csv")
clubs <- read_csv(file = "data/clubs.csv")

head(data1, n = 20)



#merging the name of the club to its own corresponding club_id 
fullPlayers <- left_join(players, clubs, join_by(current_club_id == club_id))
head(fullPlayers)

fullPlayers |> group_by(current_club_name,last_name ) |> summarise()
```
